title: Poster, "Jean Prouvé: Architekt und Konstrukteur", 1978
inscribed: Printed in brown ink, on diagonal at left: "JEAN PROUVE / Architekt und Konstrukteur"; below at left: "Austellung / im Kunstgewerbemuseum Zurich / organisiert / von der Arkhitekturabteilung / an der Ingenieurschule Genf / Ecoles techniques seperieures"; lower left: "15. April - 21. Mai 1978 / Offnungszeiten: / Dienstag bis Freitag 10-18 Uhr / Mittwoch 10-21 Uhr / Samstag/Sonntag 10-12, 14-17 Uhr / Montag geschlossen".
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: The background is a black-and-white photograph of a multi-story apartment complex, taken from below.  The name JEAN PROUVE runs along one of the vertical supports on the left and remainder of text is placed in the two lowest trapezoidal-shaped areas,

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Jean Prouvé: Architekt und Konstrukteur", 1978.
1978. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-44.
